<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Creates a logical object of the given KIND. The signature for the created</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// functions looks like:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   LVScope &#42;createScope()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   LVScopeRoot &#42;creatScopeRoot()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   LVType &#42;createType();</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="#a493d16683753f92c1bfabea7849b70a9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LV&#95;CREATE&#95;OBJECT(KIND)                                                 \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  LV##KIND &#42;create##KIND() &#123;                                                   \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">    return new (Allocated##KIND.Allocate()) LV##KIND();                        \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
